long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides number of customizable keyboard shortcuts for comfortable web browsing. This extension is optimized for key bindings assigned with modifier keys like Emacs (Ctrl-*, Alt-*, …). It is also suitable for non-modified key bindings like Vim.

This extension provides operations below:
  - Scroll Up / Down
  - Scroll Left / Right
  - Page Up / Down
  - Scroll Top / Scroll Bottom
  - Focus In / Out
  - History Back / Forward
  - Tab Open / Close
  - Goto Parent Directory
  - Mark

※ In Windows, some of the default key assignments will not work properly since they conflict with Chrome default shortcuts.

This extension is minimal and lightweight for primitive operations. There are extensions which supplementarily strengthen keyboard experiences.
  * Moly HaH
    - Hit-a-Hint. "Click" hyper links with a keyboard.
  * Moly Tab Menu
    - Select tabs with a keyboard.
